roleset.name: to ascend or descend
roleset.note: SLOPE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls spatial_configuration-47.6. (from slope.01-v)

example.name: with direction
example.text: Scenario 1 , known [*] as the `` Constant Dollar Freeze , '' reimburses the Pentagon for inflation only -- it slopes upward at 4 % per year .
